alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haulover Canal, moving northwest at 30 mph. This storm is moving toward Oak Hill, Edgewater, and New Smyrna Beach. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Orange, New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater, Oak Hill and Scottsmoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
